abstract: Howard Stern’s first night as a judge on the show helped keep NBC in first place for Monday night.
snippet: Howard Stern’s first night as a judge on the show helped keep NBC in first place for Monday night.
lead_paragraph: Howard Stern helped NBC continue its strong ratings performance on Monday nights as his first night as a judge on “America’s Got Talent” kept the network in first place in the 8 p.m.-to-10 p.m. time period among the viewers most sought by advertisers.

headline.main: Stern’s Arrival Bolsters ‘America’s Got Talent’ Ratings
